entry.title: 3M SPF-1X1 - Scotchgard Surface Protection Film, 2200, 0.3 m x 0.3 m (1 Ft x 1 Ft) Spf-1x1 7100077932
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 42.55

[shortdesc]

Scotchgard Surface Protection Film, 2200, 0.3 m x 0.3 m (1 ft x 1 ft)

  • Scotchgard™ Surface Protection Film, 2200 is designed to protect stone from any vinyl flooring, bathroom surfaces and walls from their everyday challenges
  • This protective film can be applied to waxed vinyl, sealed concrete, marble, ceramic tile, terrazo and more.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • No special tools or techniques are required to install or remove film
  • Product applies to surfaces easily within minutes
  • Compatible with standard floor cleaning procedure, floor disinfectants, cleaners and coatings
  • Reduces the number of stripping and recoating required
    		•

entry.title: 3M Scotchgard C-SGSF - Scotchgard Stone Floor Protector 1 Gallon (3.8 L) 7000141473
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Scotchgard
Price: 354.17

[shortdesc]

Scotchgard Stone Floor Protector, C-SGSF, 3.8 L (1 gal)

  • The Scotchgard™ Stone Floor Protector is a high performance floor surface hardener
  • Just two coats produce a clean, shiny, durable finish that is less susceptible to scuffs, black marks, stains and scratches
  • It is ideally suited for concrete, marble, terrazzo, and other porous stone surfaces
  • It produces a glossy, very hard, dust repellent, chemical-resistant and watertight surface
  • This protectant surface is easy to repair or recoat, with no stripping required
  • When scratches do occur on the surface, it can be repaired by burnishing with Scotch-Brite™ Purple Diamond Floor Pad Plus.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Scotchgard
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Scotchgard

    Product Information

  • Easy to repair
    		•

entry.title: 3M Scotchgard C-UHS25 - Scotchgard Uhs 25 Floor Finish 2.5 Gallon (9.5 L) 7000141474
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Scotchgard
Price: 138.57

[shortdesc]

Scotchgard UHS 25 Floor Finish, C-UHS25, 9.5 L (2.5 gal)

  • Scotchgard™ UHS 25 Floor Finish, C-UHS25 combines a special blend of waxes and acrylic co-polymers in a ready-to-use formula to protect resilient and terrazzo floors
  • It is designed for ultra high speed maintenance programs in high traffic areas that are frequently burnished
  • This finish features a special 25% solids formula that results in maximum shine and durability
  • It quickly dries to a high gloss finish in 15 to 30 minutes.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Scotchgard
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Scotchgard

    Product Information

  • Easy application - low mop drag
  • Excellent leveling, dry time, and slip resistance
  • Soil, abrasion and black mark resistant

    • Suggested Application

  • Best performance in high traffic areas
  • Easily repaired with ultra high speed equipment
    		•

entry.title: 3M F-4100-WHT-10 - White Super Polish Pad 4100 10 in 7000120645
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Pads - Polishing
Price: 15.67

[shortdesc]

3M White Super Polish Pad, 4100, 254 mm (10 in)

  • 3M™ White Super Polish Pad, 4100 is ideal for buffing very soft finishes or for polishing soft waxes on wood floors
  • It removes scuffs and black heel marks and enhances floor appearance.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Pads - Polishing

    Product Information

  • Can be used to polish wood floors, spray cleaning or dry buffing soft finishes (using a rotary machine)
  • Made of polyester fibres in an open textured non-woven construction
